    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Game()
      The constructor deals out the cards from the shuffled deck into the hands of player 1 and player 2

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean gameOver()
      The gameOver method returns true if either player's hand is empty, meaning the game is done.
      int getNumWars()
      The getNumWars method returns the int wars, which is the number of wars in one turn.
      Card getP1()
      The getP1 method returns the card for Player 1
      Card getP2()
      The getP2 method returns the card for Player 2
      static void main(String[] args) 
      void turn()
      The turn method represents a single turn in the game, wars included.
      boolean war(Card p1, Card p2)
      The war method returns true if the cards are of equal rank, meaning there is a war.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Game

        public Game()
        The constructor deals out the cards from the shuffled deck into the hands of player 1 and player 2

    • Method Detail

      • turn

        public void turn()
        The turn method represents a single turn in the game, wars included. Anytime there is a war, the program runs through another step and flips a card

      • war

        public boolean war(Card p1,
          Card p2)
        The war method returns true if the cards are of equal rank, meaning there is a war.
        Parameters:
        p1 - A card to be tested
        p2 - A card to be tested

      • gameOver

        public boolean gameOver()
        The gameOver method returns true if either player's hand is empty, meaning the game is done. If the game is over, it will print the winner of the game.

      • getP1

        public Card getP1()
        The getP1 method returns the card for Player 1

      • getP2

        public Card getP2()
        The getP2 method returns the card for Player 2

      • getNumWars

        public int getNumWars()
        The getNumWars method returns the int wars, which is the number of wars in one turn.

      • main

        public static void main(String[] args)
